text: The Wild Baby () is a children's book series about a wild young infant boy named Ben. The books were written in Swedish by Barbro Lindgren and illustrated by Eva Eriksson. It was made into puppetry in 2010. == Books == Title Year The Wild Baby (Mamman och den vilda bebin) 1980 - English edition (1981) The Wild Baby Goes to Sea 1982 - English edition (1983) adapted by Jack Prelutsky The Wild Baby's Dog 1985 ==References== Category:Swedish children's books
title: The Wild Baby
